name: Charge Your Phone
description:
"Mundane" Game Jam

Project Role | Game Design, Developer, Artist

Project Duration | 3 weeks

Tools Used | Unity

Charger Your Phone is a Turn Base Roguelike Card Game. In this game, the avatar is a normal person who needs to do a lot of things with her phone every day. So, she needs to charge the phone frequently.
players need to use random cards to connect the charge and phones. Thus use the phone to complete various tasks in different scenarios. The reward from those tasks allows players to upgrade their decks.
